channel.title: Making weapons hit more then twice?
channel.description: I made this cool custom item but it has like 5 little sticking on chains around it..almost like numchuks chained to a flail lol and the numchuks have spikes i wanna make it hit like 4 or 5 times..how would i do that?

item.title: Making weapons hit more then twice?
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote author=the man880 link=topic=331613.msg2592467#msg2592467 date=1229836103]

[quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=331613.msg2592293#msg2592293 date=1229829419]
Try changing your code to this then:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14066 && specialAmount > 49) //adrilian flail
{
    for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
    {
        specialAtk(true, 25, 639, 0x426);
        if(misc.random(3) == 0) // 25% chance of ending attack early to randomize amount of hits
            break;
    }
    getHit(0);
    usingSpecial = true;
}

nope =(
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2009, 03:55:55 pm[/size][hr][quote author=xray veeo link=topic=331613.msg2593872#msg2593872 date=1229901763]

[quote author=the man880 link=topic=331613.msg2592467#msg2592467 date=1229836103]

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:29, topic:251265”]Try changing your code to this then:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14066 && specialAmount > 49) //adrilian flail
{
    for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
    {
        specialAtk(true, 25, 639, 0x426);
        if(misc.random(3) == 0) // 25% chance of ending attack early to randomize amount of hits
            break;
    }
    getHit(0);
    usingSpecial = true;
}

nope =([/quote]
anyone help???

Read full topic

item.title: Making weapons hit more then twice?
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:23, topic:251265”][quote author=xray veeo link=topic=331613.msg2592187#msg2592187 date=1229825872]

yeah, i have dragon claws in my server (317 delta based)
and i want to make it hit twice

Edit: i mean i get no errors but when i login and use a special it only hits twice

You’re making no sense, and gtfo with your noob silent jc’s claws…

[/quote]
Is it working for you? Or what is happening?[/quote]
no its not, this is what i have, and it hits twice.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 14066 && specialAmount > 49){ //adrilian flail
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
specialAtk(true, 25, 639, 0x426);
getHit(0);
usingSpecial = true;
for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
{
    hitDiff = misc.random(20);
    player.hitUpdateRequired = true;
    if(misc.random(3) == 0) // 25% chance of ending attack early to randomize amount of hits
        break;
}
}

this is what i had to change because i got errors:

    hitDiff = misc.random(20);
    player.hitUpdateRequired = true;

which i know is wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: Making weapons hit more then twice?
item.dc:creator: @the_man880 the man880
item.description:
@the_man880 wrote:

yeah, i have dragon claws in my server (317 delta based)
and i want to make it hit four times, so here’s what i currently put in,

fix this please, i’m confussed

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtk(true, 25, 639, 0x426);
specialAtk(true, 25, 639, 0x426);
getHit(0);
usingSpecial = true;
for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
{
client otherPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
otherPlayer.hitDiff = misc.random(20);
otherPlayer.hitUpdateRequired = true;
if(misc.random(3) == 0) // 25% chance of ending attack early to randomize amount of hits
break;
}
}

Edit: i mean i get no errors but when i login and use a special it only hits twice
